name: Push-ups
description: Plank position, hands a little wider than shoulder width.  On knees OK.

name: Pull-ups
description: Hands wider than shoulders, chin to bar.

name: Planks
description: On forearms, straight back & butt, on balls of feet.

name: Run up & down stairs
description: All 8 flights of stairs, each way.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: Arms to at least 45 degrees upwards
